    All functions

    hf_list_authors()

    List Authors

    hf_list_datasets()

    List Datasets

    List Languages

    hf_list_libraries()

    List Libraries

    hf_list_licenses()

    List Licenses

    hf_list_models()

    List Models

    hf_list_tasks()

    List Tasks

    hf_load_AutoModel()

    Import a pre-trained model for a specific task.

    hf_load_dataset()

    Load a dataset from the Hugging Face Hub!

    hf_load_model()

    Load a pre-trained AutoModel object from Hugging Face

    hf_load_pipeline()

    Load a pipeline object from Hugging Face - pipelines usually include a model, tokenizer and task.

    hf_load_sentence_model()

    Load Sentence Model

    hf_load_tokenizer()

    Load an AutoTokenizer from a pre-tained model

    hf_predict()

    Use a Hugging Face pipeline or model_id to quickly predict on your inputs

    hf_python_depends()

    Install Python Dependencies

    hf_search_models()

    Search Models

    hf_set_device()

    Try to set device to GPU for accelerated computation

    models_with_downloads

    Dataset of model names, tasks & download info
